section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: In 75-1775, Massachusetts against Westcott for reasons stated in opinion for the Court filed this morning, the judgement of the Supreme Judicial Court of Massachusetts is vacated.
The case is remanded for further consideration in light of Douglas against Seacoast Products decided today.
In this case, Mr. Justice Rehnquist concurs in a judgment of the Court under the authority of Douglas against Seacoast products.
